divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a warm clear starry summernight and I sat in my garden enjoying a cold drink. I was looking at the stars and when I was staring at the stars I saw something which looked like a star but was moving and was brighter than the stars. It was just moving slowly in the nightsky heading north. First I thought it was a plane because I saw many other planes that night but they all have blinking lights and are far different than the object and less high, the object was just a solid bright light, I looked at it for maybe 15 minutes until I couldn't see it anymore it was too far away. My reaction was that I couldn't believe my eyes, but I still wonder if it wasn't a falling star, but falling stars go downwards, this object did not it just went north.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Leiden
There were no other sightings in Leiden on or around
Summary: I saw a bright light crossing the night sky!
